channel.title: NPC Walk and Attack emote IDs?

item.title: NPC Walk and Attack emote IDs?
item.dc:creator: @SparkyRealms SparkyRealms
item.description:
@SparkyRealms wrote:

Alright, so those of you familar with the ::pnpc command, it lets you morph into a NPC. Just asthetics, no abilites or anything.

Well, when I have it, the player turns into the NPC alright, but it has that “Strecthing model” effect. So I added:

[code] if (cmd[0].equals(“pnpc”)) {
p.npcType = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);

                           p.requestAnim(0, 0);
                           p.runEmote = 0;
                           p.walkEmote = 0;
                           p.standEmote = 0;	

                                               p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
			p.updateReq = true;
		}[/code]

In an attempt to make the character’s emote be still: So the streching wouldn’t happen, although the charater as a NPC would now “Glide” when moving (motionless) However that failed.

So my question is: What are the ID’s for NPC movement? I don’t need a complete list, but I’d like at least: KBD, KQ, Dust Devil, Demon. Any non-humanoid NPC really. OR what is the emote id for a still animation - so no streching occurs.

Any help is highly appreciated in advance.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC Walk and Attack emote IDs?
